attributes.action: remove the discrimination against British State pensioners who retire in cretain overseas countries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is totally unfair that, albeit we worked and contributed to our pensions while in the UK, we are now being denied any upratings in line with other UK pensioners just because we chose to live in Canada. Discrimination!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "remove the discrimination against British State pensioners who retire in cretain overseas countries."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16483
